subject: Reorganize ContextBar: pages get own row on mobile
body:
On mobile (<640px), pages row now sits above the cell selector + undo/redo
row instead of everything being crammed into one line. Page action buttons
and undo/redo are also slightly larger on mobile for easier tap targets.
Desktop layout is unchanged (single row).
